columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the identity provider configuration.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of the identity provider configuration.

columns.name: client_id
columns.description: This is also known as audience. The ID of the client application that makes authentication requests to the OIDC identity provider.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the configuration.

columns.name: groups_claim
columns.description: The JSON web token (JWT) claim that the provider uses to return your groups.

columns.name: groups_prefix
columns.description: The prefix that is prepended to group claims to prevent clashes with existing names (such as system: groups).

columns.name: issuer_url
columns.description: The URL of the OIDC identity provider that allows the API server to discover public signing keys for verifying tokens.

columns.name: username_claim
columns.description: The JSON Web token (JWT) claim that is used as the username.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The status of the OIDC identity provider.

columns.name: username_prefix
columns.description: The prefix that is prepended to username claims to prevent clashes with existing names.

columns.name: required_claims
columns.description: The key-value pairs that describe required claims in the identity token.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: The metadata to apply to the provider configuration to assist with categorization and organization.
